host.title: Host
host.description: Hostname of the Typesense instance without protocol.

port.title: Port
port.description: Port of the Typesense instance. Ex: 8108, 80, 443. Default is 443

protocol.title: Protocol
protocol.description: Protocol of the Typesense instance. Ex: http or https. Default is https

batch_size.title: Batch size
batch_size.description: How many documents should be imported together. Default 1000
